name: Deep Diver (lilou_cormic, Joshua McLean)
description:
Deep Diver

Made in a 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48  for which the theme was Deeper and deeper. 

How to play

- Avoid hitting fish while going the deepest possible.
- Shoot torpedoes if necessary.
- Collect health points, ammo, and a shield

Controls

Keyboard
- Move: AD / QD / Arrow keys
- Shoot: Space / Right Ctrl
Gamepad
- Move: Left-stick / D-pad
- Shoot: Left face button / Bottom face button

Credits

Programming by lilou_cormic (purplecable.ca)
Music by Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)

Made in Unity 2020.3.4f1.
Source code available on GitHub
